temp0_stamp-letter-send_1short: In a faraway land, there was a magical mailbox where you could write a letter to anyone you wanted. To make it extra special, you had to put a shiny stamp on the corner of the envelope. As soon as you did, the mailbox would start to glow and you could send your letter flying through the air to its destination. One day, a little girl named Lily wrote a letter to her best friend who lived on the other side of the world, put a beautiful butterfly stamp on it, and sent it off with a wish. The letter soared over mountains and oceans, carrying Lily's love and friendship to her dear friend. When it arrived, her friend was overjoyed to receive the special letter and couldn't wait to write back and send it flying through the air once again.
temp0_petrol-diesel-pump_1short: In a world where cars could talk, a little red vehicle named Rosie ran out of fuel on a long road trip. With a full tank of petrol, Rosie roared back to life and continued her journey, feeling grateful for the kind stranger's help. As she drove away, she noticed a big sign that read "Petrol and Diesel Available" and smiled, knowing she'd never forget her exciting adventure at the pump. From then on, Rosie made sure to always keep an eye on her fuel gauge to avoid another scary moment.
